channel.title: Zodiac's Reign Tool Packs Removed by Jagex (please upload again?)
channel.description:
Guys, all of Zodiacs tools are deleted (copyright violations filed by jagex) and I really need them. Could someone please take the time to reupload them to uppit so I can download them? I would appreciate it. :)
Thanks!
[IMG]http://i1133.photobucket.com/albums/m594/Kleber_Leaf/FreeCloudStorage-MediaFire-MozillaFirefox_2012-12-11_15-12-33.png[/img]

item.title: Zodiac's Reign Tool Packs Removed by Jagex (please upload again?)
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

Requests like these are not allowed, sorry. If you want the original files I would recommend getting in contact with Zodiac, or whoever made the tools.

Read full topic
